name: Padding
info: Can accommodate a child component, adding its own padding to limit the child component's placement. The core property is padding.

nodes.name: Padding Equal Margin on All Sides
desc: EdgeInsets.all is used to define the same margin on all four sides

nodes.name: Padding Individual Margin
desc: EdgeInsets.only is used to define the same margin on all four sides

nodes.name: Padding Directional Margin
desc: EdgeInsets.symmetric is used to define horizontal and vertical margins
